material_id.description: [string]The material id to apply these texture overrides

texture_path.description: [texture]The path to the texture to assign to the slot material_lut.

pattern_texture_path.description: [texture]The path to the texture to assign to the slot pattern_lut.

pattern_mask_array_path.description: [texture]The path to the texture to assign to the slot pattern_masks_array.
